SELECT /* prRsvSaleHist.prRsvSaleHistBaseToNormalMeth */ PGB.GOODS_TYP_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR002',PGB.GOODS_TYP_CD) AS GOODS_TYP_NM , PGB.GOODS_NO , PGB.GOODS_NM , PGB.MODL_NM , PBM.BRAND_NM , PGB.SALE_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR005',PGB.SALE_STAT_CD) AS SALE_STAT_NM , PGB.SALE_METH_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR003',PGB.SALE_METH_CD) AS SALE_METH_NM , EEB.ENTR_NM , SUB.USER_NM AS MD , COALESCE( (SELECT STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG T WHERE T.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_LRG_CTG_NO),'') || COALESCE('>'||(SELECT STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG T WHERE T.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_MID_CTG_NO),'') || COALESCE('>'||(SELECT STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG T WHERE T.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_SML_CTG_NO),'') || COALESCE('>'||(SELECT STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG T WHERE T.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_THN_CTG_NO),'') AS STR_CTG , CASE WHEN PGB.DISP_YN = 'Y' THEN '전시' ELSE '전시안함' END DISP_YN , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR006',PGB.BUY_TYP_CD) AS BUY_TYP_NM , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR007',PGB.TAX_GB_CD) AS TAX_GB_NM , PGPH.NOR_PRC , PGPH.MRGN_RATE , PGPH.SALE_PRC , TO_CHAR(PGB.GOODS_REG_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS GOODS_REG_DTM , (SELECT TO_CHAR(RSV_STRT_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') FROM PR_RSV_SALE_HIST WHERE GOODS_NO = PGB.GOODS_NO ORDER BY RSV_END_DTM DESC LIMIT 1) AS RSV_STRT_DTM , (SELECT TO_CHAR(RSV_END_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') FROM PR_RSV_SALE_HIST WHERE GOODS_NO = PGB.GOODS_NO ORDER BY RSV_END_DTM DESC LIMIT 1) AS RSV_END_DTM , (SELECT SUBSTRING(FWDIDC_PRAR_DY,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTRING(FWDIDC_PRAR_DY,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTRING(FWDIDC_PRAR_DY,7,2) FROM PR_RSV_SALE_HIST WHERE GOODS_NO = PGB.GOODS_NO ORDER BY RSV_END_DTM DESC LIMIT 1) AS FWDIDC_PRAR_DY , (SELECT RSV_END_AF_PROC_METH_CD FROM PR_RSV_SALE_HIST WHERE GOODS_NO = PGB.GOODS_NO ORDER BY RSV_END_DTM DESC LIMIT 1) AS RSV_END_AF_PROC_METH_CD , (SELECT FN_GET_CODENAME('PR011',RSV_END_AF_PROC_METH_CD) AS RSV_END_AF_PROC_METH_NM FROM PR_RSV_SALE_HIST WHERE GOODS_NO = PGB.GOODS_NO ORDER BY RSV_END_DTM DESC LIMIT 1) AS RSV_END_AF_PROC_METH_NM FROM PR_GOODS_BASE PGB , PR_GOODS_PRC_HIST PGPH , PR_STD_CTG PSC , ST_USER_BASE SUB , ET_ENTR_BASE EEB , PR_BRAND_MST PBM WHERE PGB.GOODS_NO = PGPH.GOODS_NO AND PGPH.HIST_END_DTM = TO_TIMESTAMP('29991231235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND PGB.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_CTG_NO AND PSC.MD_ID = SUB.USER_ID AND PGB.ENTR_NO = EEB.ENTR_NO AND PGB.BRAND_NO = PBM.BRAND_NO AND PGB.GOODS_COMP_CD = '10' AND PGB.SALE_METH_CD = #{saleMethCd} AND PGB.GOODS_REG_DTM >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}||'000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND PGB.GOODS_REG_DTM <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}||'235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
AND PSC.MD_ID LIKE #{userId} || '%'
AND EEB.ENTR_NO LIKE #{entrNo} || '%' AND PBM.BRAND_NO LIKE #{brandNo} || '%' AND PGB.SALE_STAT_CD LIKE #{saleStatCd} || '%' AND PGB.GOODS_NO LIKE #{goodsNo} || '%' AND PGB.GOODS_NM LIKE #{goodsNm} || '%'

SELECT /* prRsvSaleHist.prRsvSaleHistBaseToRsvMeth */ PGB.GOODS_TYP_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR002',PGB.GOODS_TYP_CD) AS GOODS_TYP_NM , PGB.GOODS_NO , PGB.GOODS_NM , PGB.MODL_NM , PBM.BRAND_NM , PGB.SALE_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR005',PGB.SALE_STAT_CD) AS SALE_STAT_NM , PGB.SALE_METH_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR003',PGB.SALE_METH_CD) AS SALE_METH_NM , EEB.ENTR_NM , SUB.USER_NM AS MD , COALESCE( (SELECT STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG T WHERE T.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_LRG_CTG_NO),'') || COALESCE('>'||(SELECT STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG T WHERE T.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_MID_CTG_NO),'') || COALESCE('>'||(SELECT STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG T WHERE T.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_SML_CTG_NO),'') || COALESCE('>'||(SELECT STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG T WHERE T.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_THN_CTG_NO),'') AS STR_CTG , CASE WHEN PGB.DISP_YN = 'Y' THEN '전시' ELSE '전시안함' END DISP_YN , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR006',PGB.BUY_TYP_CD) AS BUY_TYP_NM , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR007',PGB.TAX_GB_CD) AS TAX_GB_NM , PGPH.NOR_PRC , PGPH.MRGN_RATE , PGPH.SALE_PRC , TO_CHAR(PGB.GOODS_REG_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS GOODS_REG_DTM , TO_CHAR(PRSH.RSV_STRT_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS RSV_STRT_DTM , TO_CHAR(PRSH.RSV_END_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS RSV_END_DTM , SUBSTRING(PRSH.FWDIDC_PRAR_DY,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTRING(PRSH.FWDIDC_PRAR_DY,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTRING(PRSH.FWDIDC_PRAR_DY,7,2) AS FWDIDC_PRAR_DY , PRSH.RSV_END_AF_PROC_METH_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR011',PRSH.RSV_END_AF_PROC_METH_CD) AS RSV_END_AF_PROC_METH_NM -- 예약종료후 판매방식명 FROM PR_GOODS_BASE PGB , PR_GOODS_PRC_HIST PGPH , PR_RSV_SALE_HIST PRSH , PR_STD_CTG PSC , ST_USER_BASE SUB , ET_ENTR_BASE EEB , PR_BRAND_MST PBM WHERE PGB.GOODS_NO = PGPH.GOODS_NO AND PGB.GOODS_NO = PRSH.GOODS_NO AND PGPH.HIST_END_DTM = TO_TIMESTAMP('29991231235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND PGB.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_CTG_NO AND PSC.MD_ID = SUB.USER_ID AND PGB.ENTR_NO = EEB.ENTR_NO AND PGB.BRAND_NO = PBM.BRAND_NO AND PGB.GOODS_COMP_CD = '10' AND PRSH.RSV_STOP_YN = 'N' AND PGB.SALE_METH_CD = #{saleMethCd} AND PGB.GOODS_REG_DTM >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}||'000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND PGB.GOODS_REG_DTM <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}||'235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
AND PSC.MD_ID LIKE #{userId} || '%'
AND EEB.ENTR_NO LIKE #{entrNo} || '%' AND PBM.BRAND_NO LIKE #{brandNo} || '%' AND PGB.SALE_STAT_CD LIKE #{saleStatCd} || '%' AND PGB.GOODS_NO LIKE #{goodsNo} || '%' AND PGB.GOODS_NM LIKE #{goodsNm} || '%'
mapper.select: SELECT /* prRsvSaleHist.getReservationSaleHistList */ TO_CHAR(PRSH.RSV_STRT_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RSV_STRT_DTM , TO_CHAR(PRSH.RSV_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RSV_END_DTM , SUBSTRING(FWDIDC_PRAR_DY,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTRING(FWDIDC_PRAR_DY,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTRING(FWDIDC_PRAR_DY,7,2) AS FWDIDC_PRAR_DY , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR011',RSV_END_AF_PROC_METH_CD) AS RSV_END_AF_PROC_METH_NM , PRSH.RSV_STOP_YN , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR034',RSV_STOP_CAUS_CD) AS RSV_STOP_CAUS_NM , PRSH.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(PRSH.SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_GOODS_BASE PGB , PR_RSV_SALE_HIST PRSH , PR_STD_CTG PSC , ST_USER_BASE SUB , ET_ENTR_BASE EEB WHERE PGB.GOODS_NO = PRSH.GOODS_NO AND PGB.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_CTG_NO AND PSC.MD_ID = SUB.USER_ID AND PGB.ENTR_NO = EEB.ENTR_NO AND PGB.GOODS_NO LIKE #{goodsNo} || '%' ORDER BY PRSH.RSV_END_DTM DESC

SELECT GOODS_NO /* prRsvSaleHist.getRsvSaleHist */ , TO_CHAR(RSV_STRT_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS RSV_STRT_DTM , TO_CHAR(RSV_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS RSV_END_DTM , SUBSTRING(FWDIDC_PRAR_DY,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTRING(FWDIDC_PRAR_DY,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTRING(FWDIDC_PRAR_DY,7,2) AS FWDIDC_PRAR_DY , RSV_END_AF_PROC_METH_CD , RSV_STOP_YN , RSV_STOP_CAUS_CD , TO_CHAR(RSV_STOP_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS RSV_STOP_DTM , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_RSV_SALE_HIST WHERE GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo} AND RSV_STOP_YN = 'N'
